mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id as orderId, o.partner_id as partnerId, p.partner_name as partnerName, p.partner_type as partnerType, p.manager_name as managerName, p.contact_info as contactInfo, p.partner_address as partnerAddress, o.product_id as productId, pr.product_name as productName, pr.option_value as optionValue, pr.selling_price as sellingPrice, o.quantity, o.stock_status as stockStatus, o.created_at as createdAt FROM TB_ORDERS o JOIN TB_PARTNER p ON o.partner_id = p.partner_id JOIN TB_PRODUCT pr ON o.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ORDERS ( order_id, partner_id, product_id, quantity, stock_status, created_at ) VALUES ( seq_orders.NEXTVAL, #{partnerId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{stockStatus}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ORDERS SET partner_id = #{partnerId}, product_id = #{productId}, quantity = #{quantity}, stock_status = #{stockStatus} WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
